leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-谱学解析与表征生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→峰识别→指认→定量→报告

queries: [WEB] open source raman spectral database github

tools.name: BoxSERS
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for processing and analyzing vibrational spectra (Raman, SERS, FTIR)
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides a full range of functionality to process and analyze vibrational spectra, including Raman, SERS, and FTIR data. It supports various preprocessing and analysis tasks tailored for vibrational spectroscopy.

tools.name: SpectraFit
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for quick data-fitting of spectra based on distribution functions
tools.detailed_description: SpectraFit is a command-line and Jupyter-notebook tool designed for quick data-fitting of spectral data based on the regular expression of distribution functions. It facilitates peak fitting and spectral analysis.

tools.name: CRIkit2
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperspectral imaging toolkit for coherent Raman imaging
tools.detailed_description: CRIKit2 is a hyperspectral imaging toolkit, formerly known as the coherent Raman imaging toolkit. It provides tools for processing and analyzing hyperspectral data, specifically designed for coherent Raman imaging applications.

tools.name: PyQt5-RamanSpectraClassification
tools.one_line_profile: GUI application for Raman spectral classification
tools.detailed_description: A Raman spectral classification tool built with PyQt5, providing a graphical user interface for analyzing and classifying Raman spectra.

tools.name: fNIRS
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Near Infrared Spectroscopy brain imaging data processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly data processing pipeline for Functional Near Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) brain imaging data. It facilitates the analysis of NIRS data for neuroscience applications.

tools.name: OpenSA
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive algorithm library for spectral analysis (OpenSpectrum Analysis)
tools.detailed_description: OpenSA (OpenSpectrum Analysis) is a complete algorithm library for spectral analysis. It covers common training dataset splitting, spectrum preprocessing, wavelength selection, and calibration model algorithms.

tools.name: Spectral-preprocessing-algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of common spectral preprocessing algorithms in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A collection of common spectral preprocessing algorithms implemented in MATLAB, including Savitzky-Golay smoothing, Multiplicative Scatter Correction (MSC), Standard Normal Variate (SNV), and derivatives.

tools.name: pyChemometrics
tools.one_line_profile: Library for multivariate analysis of chemometric and metabonomic datasets
tools.detailed_description: pyChemometrics provides objects and tools for multivariate analysis of chemometric and metabonomic datasets, facilitating statistical analysis and modeling in chemistry.

tools.name: RSClassification
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Raman spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for the analysis of Raman spectroscopy data, developed by ISCLab-Bistu. It supports classification tasks for Raman spectra.

tools.name: LumiSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Luminescence data analysis extension for HyperSpy
tools.detailed_description: LumiSpy is a Python package for luminescence data analysis, built as an extension to HyperSpy. It provides tools for processing and analyzing luminescence spectroscopy data.

tools.name: Plot2Spec
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic plot digitizer for spectroscopy images
tools.detailed_description: Plot2Spec is an automatic plot digitizer designed specifically for spectroscopy images, such as XANES and Raman spectra. It converts image plots back into numerical spectral data.

tools.name: PySpectra
tools.one_line_profile: Library to work with spectroscopy spectra files
tools.detailed_description: PySpectra provides functions to work with various spectroscopy spectra files, facilitating data import and manipulation for spectral analysis.

tools.name: Tetracorder
tools.one_line_profile: Spectroscopy analysis and spectral identification software
tools.detailed_description: Tetracorder is a spectroscopy analysis and spectral identification software system. It is used for radiative transfer modeling and identifying materials from spectral data.

tools.name: signal-id
tools.one_line_profile: Signal identification and noise estimation in spectral line data cubes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for signal identification and noise estimation in spectral line data cubes, developed by the PHANGS team. While primarily for astronomy, it handles spectral cube data relevant to hyperspectral analysis.

tools.name: OpenVibSpec
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Python packages for vibrational spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python packages designed for processing and analyzing vibrational spectroscopy data (IR/Raman), developed by the Bioinformatics group at Ruhr University Bochum.

tools.name: BaselineRemoval
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline removal algorithms for Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing baseline removal, correction, and subtraction on Raman spectra using algorithms like Modpoly, ImodPoly, and Zhang fit.

tools.name: DeepCID
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning-based component identification for Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method and tool for identifying chemical components in Raman spectroscopy data, aiming to provide accurate and easy component identification.

tools.name: DeepRaman
tools.one_line_profile: Universal method for component identification in Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based approach for accurate and universal component identification in Raman spectroscopy, designed to simplify the analysis process.

tools.name: py-wdf-reader
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for Renishaw WiRE WDF Raman spectroscopy files
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for read-only access to WDF Raman spectroscopy files generated by Renishaw WiRE software, facilitating data import and processing.

tools.name: reremeter
tools.one_line_profile: System for plastic identification using NIR spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: Software and hardware design for a low-cost, handheld system to identify plastic types based on discrete near-infrared (NIR) reflectance spectroscopy.

tools.name: RamanSPy
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative Raman spectroscopy data analysis package
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for integrative Raman spectroscopy data analysis, offering tools for preprocessing, processing, and analyzing Raman datasets.

tools.name: ChemoSpec
tools.one_line_profile: R functions for chemometric analysis of spectra
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R functions for the chemometric analysis of spectroscopic data, including plotting, PCA, and HCA, suitable for various types of spectra.

tools.name: Spectra.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for spectral data treatment
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to assist in the treatment and analysis of spectral data, including Raman, Infrared, XAS, and NMR.

tools.name: rampy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for spectral data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing spectral data (IR, Raman, XAS, etc.), providing functions for baseline correction, smoothing, and other common spectroscopic tasks.

tools.name: DeepeR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for Raman spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool designed for the analysis of Raman spectroscopy data, facilitating classification and feature extraction tasks.

tools.name: OCTAVVS
tools.one_line_profile: Open Chemometrics Toolbox for Analysis and Visualization of Vibrational Spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A graphical toolbox for the processing, analysis, and visualization of vibrational spectroscopy data (IR/Raman), including preprocessing and clustering.

tools.name: DASH
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for automated spectral classification of supernovae
tools.detailed_description: A software package for the automated classification of supernova spectra using deep learning techniques.

tools.name: pybaselines
tools.one_line_profile: Library of algorithms for baseline correction of experimental data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library providing various algorithms for baseline correction of spectroscopic and experimental data.

tools.name: jcamp-dx
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation of the JCAMP-DX spectroscopy data standard
tools.detailed_description: A Java library serving as a reference implementation for reading and writing the IUPAC JCAMP-DX spectroscopy data format.

tools.name: SpectralMultivariateCalibration
tools.one_line_profile: Partial Least Squares (PLS) implementation for spectral calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Partial Least Squares (PLS) regression specifically designed for multivariate calibration in spectral analysis.

tools.name: ramanchada2
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Raman spectroscopy harmonization and processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed under the H2020 CHARISMA project for the harmonization, processing, and analysis of Raman spectroscopy data.

tools.name: PeakFit
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based peak-fitting tool for spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool designed for peak fitting and analysis of spectroscopic data, facilitating signal deconvolution.

tools.name: pySpectralTriad
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for SparkFun AS7265x Spectral Triad module
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based graphical visualization tool for interfacing with and displaying spectral response data from the SparkFun AS7265x Spectral Triad sensor.

tools.name: rosettasciio
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reading and writing scientific data formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python library (part of the HyperSpy ecosystem) for reading and writing various scientific data formats, including those used in microscopy and spectroscopy.

tools.name: brukeropus
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for reading Bruker OPUS spectroscopy files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for communicating with Bruker OPUS spectroscopy software and reading its binary file format, enabling data extraction from Bruker instruments.

tools.name: prospectr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing and sample selection of spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing miscellaneous functions for preprocessing spectroscopic data (e.g., derivatives, smoothing) and selecting representative samples.

tools.name: resemble
tools.one_line_profile: R package for non-linear modelling of spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing functions for non-linear modelling and prediction of complex spectroscopy data, including memory-based learning.

tools.name: DSTC
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-stage Hyperspectral Image Classification Model with Spectral Supertoken
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation for hyperspectral image classification that utilizes a dual-stage approach with spectral supertokens to enhance classification performance.

tools.name: FTIR-python-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for processing and extracting information from FTIR spectra
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts designed for the processing and information extraction from Fourier Transform Infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy data.

tools.name: MambaHSI
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Spectral Mamba for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Mamba architecture adapted for spatial-spectral hyperspectral image classification, offering efficient long-range dependency modeling.

tools.name: RSSAN-Hyperspectral-Image
tools.one_line_profile: Residual Spectral–Spatial Attention Network for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network incorporating residual connections and spectral-spatial attention mechanisms to improve hyperspectral image classification accuracy.

tools.name: BASS-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Band-Adaptive Spectral-Spatial Feature Learning Deep Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network designed for hyperspectral image classification that adaptively learns spectral-spatial features across different bands.

tools.name: chemometrics
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for chemometric data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools and algorithms for chemometric analysis, facilitating the interpretation of chemical data.

tools.name: SS-MTr
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral–Spatial Masked Transformer for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based model utilizing masked autoencoding strategies for spectral-spatial feature learning in hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: Spectral-spatial-Mamba-for-HSIC
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral-Spatial Mamba for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A model applying the Mamba state space model to capture spectral and spatial dependencies for classifying hyperspectral remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: 3D-HyperGAMO
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Adversarial Minority Oversampling for Hyperspectral Classification
tools.detailed_description: A Keras implementation of a 3D Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) based oversampling technique to address class imbalance in hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: pResNet-HSI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Pyramidal Residual Networks for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: Source code for Deep Pyramidal Residual Networks designed to extract spectral-spatial features for accurate hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: mne-nirs
tools.one_line_profile: Process Near-Infrared Spectroscopy Data in MNE
tools.detailed_description: A Python library extending MNE-Python to process, analyze, and visualize Near-Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) data.

tools.name: orpl
tools.one_line_profile: Open Raman Processing Library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library dedicated to the processing of Raman spectroscopy data, including baseline correction and cosmic ray removal.

tools.name: QERaman
tools.one_line_profile: First-order resonance Raman spectroscopy based on Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: A program for computing first-order resonance Raman spectroscopy intensities using output from the Quantum ESPRESSO package.

tools.name: RamanNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized neural network architecture for Raman Spectrum Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning architecture specifically designed for the analysis and classification of Raman spectra.

tools.name: L1000-bayesian
tools.one_line_profile: L1000 peak deconvolution based on Bayesian analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for peak deconvolution of L1000 assay data using Bayesian analysis methods.

tools.name: specio
tools.one_line_profile: Python input/output for spectroscopic files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading and writing various spectroscopic file formats, facilitating data interoperability.

tools.name: chemotools
tools.one_line_profile: Integrate chemometric tools with the scikit-learn API
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides chemometric preprocessing and analysis tools compatible with the scikit-learn API for seamless machine learning integration.

tools.name: HybridSN-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid-Spectral-Net for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the HybridSN model which combines 3D and 2D CNNs for effective hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: pycroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific analysis of nanoscale materials imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A python package for processing, analyzing, and visualizing multidimensional imaging and spectroscopy data, particularly for microscopy.

tools.name: pyspectral
tools.one_line_profile: Read and manipulate satellite sensor spectral responses
tools.detailed_description: A package to read and manipulate satellite sensor spectral responses and solar irradiance spectra, often used in remote sensing.

tools.name: hyperSpec
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for Spectroscopy (R package)
tools.detailed_description: An R package for handling hyperspectral data sets, such as spatially or time-resolved spectra, with functions for plotting, processing, and analysis.

tools.name: raman_tl
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline correction, smoothing, processing and plotting of Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools for the preprocessing and visualization of Raman spectra, including baseline correction and smoothing algorithms.

tools.name: Raman-noodles
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Raman and IR spectra datasets
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for the analysis of Raman and Infrared (IR) spectroscopy datasets, facilitating material identification and characterization.

tools.name: raman-spectra-decomp-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Identify and calculate decomposition of materials using Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: Python code and notebooks for decomposing Raman spectra to identify material components and their proportions.

tools.name: SpecUtils
tools.one_line_profile: Library for opening, manipulating, and exporting gamma spectral files
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library developed by Sandia Labs for handling gamma spectroscopy data files, supporting various formats and manipulation tasks.

tools.name: HPDM-SPRN
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Partitioning Residual Network for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing spectral partitioning and residual networks with spatial attention for hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: MSR-3DCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Spectral Resolution 3D CNN for Hyperspectral Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Convolutional Neural Network architecture designed to handle multiple spectral resolutions for effective hyperspectral image classification.

tools.name: FDSSC
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Dense Spectral-Spatial Convolution Network for Hyperspectral Classification
tools.detailed_description: A fast and dense convolutional network framework for spectral-spatial classification of hyperspectral images, optimizing both accuracy and speed.

tools.name: Phonopy-Spectroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for simulating vibrational spectra (IR/Raman) interfacing with Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools designed to calculate and simulate vibrational spectra, specifically Infrared (IR) and Raman spectroscopy, by post-processing data generated from Phonopy calculations.

tools.name: SpectroChemPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for processing, analyzing and modeling spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: SpectroChemPy is a Python framework dedicated to the processing, analysis, and modeling of spectroscopic data (NMR, IR, Raman, etc.) for chemistry, providing an API similar to standard scientific libraries.

tools.name: mzkit
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for mass spectrometry and spectroscopy data processing
tools.detailed_description: A data toolkit designed for processing and visualizing various types of spectral data including NMR, MALDI MSI, Raman Spectroscopy, LC-MS, and GC-MS, with features for chemoinformatics analysis.

tools.name: airPLS
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline correction using adaptive iteratively reweighted Penalized Least Squares
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the airPLS algorithm, a widely used method for baseline correction in spectroscopic data analysis (e.g., Raman, FTIR) that handles noise and background effectively.

tools.name: baselineWavelet
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet-based background correction for Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An intelligent background-correction algorithm specifically designed for removing fluorescence backgrounds from Raman spectroscopy data using wavelet transforms.
